Hi Glenn, one of the reasons I'm a fan of yours, is because you don't just report the news like so many other outlets do. You're unique because you take those news stories and facts and make sense of them. I think you're at your best when you tie things together. I really enjoyed The Root special you did, exposing what Russia is really up too. Mainsream media might gloss over a few details but they never put things together like you do. I appreciate that and have learned a lot over the years from you. So, I would like to see you continue to """"tie things together"""" as it relates to daily events. I also enjoy your """"history"""" shows. It helps me get a clearer picture of what's going on, and can learn from it. Personally, I learned a lot from your Root special. So much Russian history I didn't realize, but as you presented it, it made sense. Understanding the history of Russia makes all the difference in understanding what they're doing (their motivations & strategies). """"Founders Friday's"""" we're great, would enjoy seeing them. Finally, I always enjoy audience and """"#AskGlenn"""" shows. One reason being, we (""""the audience"""") can ask questions of you. Maybe if we're confused on a topic, need further clarification or just have a question, we have the opportunity to ask. I hope this helps you? For me, I just like to learn, learn the reasons behind what is happening, see the proof or history to back it up and try to make sense of it all.
